summary: One of the two prior issues remains unresolved: the micro-USD to cents conversion no longer enforces exact divisibility and instead rounds up.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: micro-USD to cents conversion silently truncates fractional cents; must validate divisibility or fail
previous_issues_status.notes: The revised code now uses ceiling division to round up fractional cents rather than rejecting non-divisible values, which does not satisfy the requirement for exact conversion and boundary validation.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: If microUsdToCents throws, it must be classified as non-retryable terminal validation by including conversion in the validation block
previous_issues_status.notes: Conversion is now performed inside the same try/catch as parsing, so validation failures are handled as terminal.
